medical.name: Pulse
medical.description: Sends out a recon pulse that marks hostiles and allies through walls and covers.

mods.name: Pulse
mods.description: Sends out a recon pulse that marks hostiles and allies through walls and covers.

mods.name: Recon Pack
mods.description: The pulse has an increased range and is capable of locating nearby loot containers.

mods.name: Scrambler
mods.description: The pulse protects the user and allies from hostile pulse scans.

mods.name: Tactical Scanner
mods.description: Damage is increased when attacking any hostile targets identified by the pulse scan.

mods.name: Threat Detector
mods.description: The pulse gives an early warning of nearby hostiles and identifies if the user has been scanned by a hostile pulse.

medical.name: First Aid
medical.description: Heals all allies within a small radius. The device can be used on location or launched to a distant target.

mods.name: First Aid
mods.description: Heals all allies within a small radius. The device can be used on location or launched to a distant target.

mods.name: Defibrillator
mods.description: The device can revive downed allies and grant them a portion of their normal health.

mods.name: Overdose
mods.description: The device heals targets more efficiently, and may even extend the target's health beyond its normal rating.

mods.name: Booster Shot
mods.description: Temporarily increases damage for the affected targets in additionto the normal healing effect.

mods.name: Extended Service
mods.description: Extends the duration of the effect, giving allies more time to approach the device.

medical.name: Support Station
medical.description: Drops a support station that heals allies and can be used to revive downed allies.

mods.name: Support Station
mods.description: Drops a support station that heals allies and can be used to revive downed allies.

mods.name: Life Support
mods.description: Drops a revival station that automatically revives any allies who are downed within the affected area.

mods.name: Immunizer
mods.description: Drops a recovery station that removes Status Effects and makes allies immune while within the affected area.

mods.name: Ammo Cache
mods.description: While close to the device, allies regain their ammo as they reload, and skill cooldown recovery is faster.

mods.name: Discharge
mods.description: When the device is disabled, nearby aliies receive immediate healing.

medical.name: Recovery Link
medical.description: Heals and cures the users and nearby allies. Revives downed allies within range. Can "overheal" beyond maximum health.

mods.name: Recovery Link
mods.description: Heals all allies within a small radius. The device can be used on location or launched to a distant target.

tec.name: Sticky Bomb
tec.description: Fires a bomb that sticks to most surfaces and explodes when detonated remotely.

mods.name: Sticky Bomb
mods.description: Fires a bomb that sticks to most surfaces and explodes when detonated remotely.

mods.name: BFB
mods.description: Increases the damage and radius of the explosion and may cause targets to bleed.

mods.name: Flashbang
mods.description: The bomb explodes with a non-lethal effect that blinds and disrupts all targets in range.

mods.name: Proximity Fuse
mods.description: The bomb explodes automatically when a hostile target is within range.

tec.name: Turret
tec.description: Deploys a stationary turret that attacks nearby hostiles until it is destroyed or its battery runs out.

mods.name: Turret
mods.description: Deploys a stationary turret that attacks nearby hostiles until it is destroyed or its battery runs out.

mods.name: Active Sensor
mods.description: Increases turret's damage and pulses attacked targets, making them visible to all allies.

mods.name: Dragonbreath
mods.description: Turret has reduced range but shoots a column of fire.

mods.name: Zapper
mods.description: Turret shoots electrical darts that damage and shock multiple targets.

mods.name: Scorched Earth
mods.description: Turret explodes when manually disabled, damaging all nearby targets.

tec.name: Seeker Mine
tec.description: Releases an automated mine that seeks out hostile targets before exploding on proximity.

mods.name: Seeker Mine
mods.description: Releases an automated mine that seeks out hostile targets before exploding on proximity.

mods.name: Airburst
mods.description: Upon impact, the mine is launched in the air and releases a cluster of small incendiary explosives.

mods.name: Gas Charge
mods.description: The mine seeks out and moves between multiple targets, releasing a cloud of disorienting gas on impact.

mods.name: Cluster
mods.description: Mine separates into smaller pieces that seek out multiple targets simultaneously.

mods.name: Seeking-Betty
mods.description: Mine can bounce onto and over low covers, and can move directly towards its target.

tec.name: Tactical Link
tec.description: Increases damage and critical hit chance to the user and all nearby allies.

mods.name: Tactical Link
mods.description: Increases damage and critical hit chance to the user and all nearby allies.

sec.name: Ballistic Shield
sec.description: Equips a portable Ballistic Shield that absorbs damage. The user can only use their sidearm while the shield is active.

mods.name: Ballistic Shield
mods.description: Equips a portable Ballistic Shield that absorbs damage. The user can only use their sidearm while the shield is active.

mods.name: Reactive Targeting
mods.description: Equips a stronger and lighter shield that pulses hostiles who shoot at it.

mods.name: Assault Shield
mods.description: Equips a shield that grants the users sidearm increased damage, knockback, increased accuracy, and faster reload speed.

mods.name: Kinetic Breaker
mods.description: Grants the user a small portion of incoming damage as healing

mods.name: Self-healing Armor
mods.description: After a short time without taking any damage, the shield slowly repairs itself to full health.

sec.name: Smart Cover
sec.description: Reinforces a cover, increasing the users damage and decreasing the incoming damage for all allies behind it.

mods.name: Smart Cover
mods.description: Reinforces a cover, increasing the users damage and decreasing the incoming damage for all allies behind it.

mods.name: Trapper
mods.description: Hostile targets using a reinforced cover deal less damage, while taking increased damage.

mods.name: Recharger
mods.description: Allies using a reinforced cover slowly recover their health and get their skill cooldowns decreased.

mods.name: Concealment
mods.description: Allies using a reinforced cover are hidden from hostile pulses and have reduced threat. Hostiles shot by allies from behind the cover are pulsed.

mods.name: Cover Trail
mods.description: Extends the effect so that it lasts for a period of a time after leaving the cover.

sec.name: Mobile Cover
sec.description: Creates a temporary cover for one person, which provides standard cover protection until destroyed.

mods.name: Mobile Cover
mods.description: Creates a temporary cover for one person, which provides standard cover protection until destroyed.

mods.name: Extension
mods.description: The cover provides more protection and extends to protect two persons.

mods.name: Blast Shield
mods.description: The cover is fitted with remote explosives that damage hostiles in front of it when the shield is disabled.

mods.name: Countermeasures
mods.description: While using the cover, the user deals increased damage and becomes immune to pulses.

mods.name: Second Chance
mods.description: When the cover is destroyed by incoming damage, all allies behind the shield recieve temporary damage resistance.

sec.name: Survivor Link
sec.description: Increases damage resistance and speed for the user and nearby allies.

mods.name: Survivor Link
mods.description: Increases damage resistance and speed for the user and nearby allies.
